dict.acceptation: 聪明的，有智慧的；博学的，博识的；明白的；像智者的；
使知道，使懂得；教导；指点；

sent.orig: I'd like to speak to Mr. Wise, W-I-S-E, in San Francisco.
sent.trans: 我要和旧金山的wise先生讲话。W-I-S-E,wise先生。

sent.orig: In WISE, the training programmes have carefully been designed, aiming at the participants' own immediate action.
sent.trans: 在WISE,培训计划经审慎设计，旨在令参与者能作出即时行动。

sent.orig: Protection of general environment has been integrated into the WISE training programme, too.
sent.trans: 一般环境保护亦已纳入WISE培训计划。

sent.orig: Wise men learn something of fools; but fools nothing of wise men.
sent.trans: 智者从愚人身上学到某些东西；愚人从智者身上却好不到任何东西。

sent.orig: Every purpose is put into effect by wise help: and by wise guiding make war.
sent.trans: 计谋都凭筹算立定。打仗要凭智谋。
